title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Hurricane Melissa: What to know about the catastrophic storm's impact on travel to the Caribbean
items.description: Hurricane Melissa is predicted to make landfall in Jamaica as a powerful Category 5 storm, causing catastrophic damage to the Caribbean island.

items.title: Southwest Airlines unveils a new debit (yes, debit) card that earns points
items.description: Southwest announced a brand-new, cobranded Rapid Rewards debit card that will allow members to earn points on everyday spending — with no credit check...

items.title: Southwest card welcome bonus: Earn 85,000 bonus points with any of the personal cards
items.description: You can earn a lot of points with Southwest Airlines credit cards thanks, in part, to their current welcome bonus offers. Here are the details.

items.title: Don't make these time-change mistakes when planning travel
items.description: When you travel, follow our tips to avoid common daylight-saving snafus and other time-zone mistakes.

items.title: Bilt Rewards isn’t just for renters — here’s why there’s something for everyone now
items.description: Bilt Rewards started as a program for renters, but now it offers value for everyone. See why this loyalty program is worth joining today.
